description: Detects a suspicious process pattern which could be a sign of an exploited Serv-U service
false_positives: Legitimate uses in which users or programs use the SSH service of Serv-U for remote command execution
name: Suspicious Serv-U Process Pattern
query: (process.parent.executable:*\\Serv\-U.exe AND process.executable:(*\\cmd.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\sh.exe OR *\\bash.exe OR *\\schtasks.exe OR *\\regsvr32.exe OR *\\wmic.exe OR *\\mshta.exe OR *\\rundll32.exe OR *\\msiexec.exe OR *\\forfiles.exe OR *\\scriptrunner.exe))
author: Florian Roth
